file_content.text: Greetings, my lord. On your way to the capital?
Greetings, hunter. On your way to the capital?
Greetings, master. On your way to the capital?
Greetings, mistress. On your way to the capital?
There is a shuttle to Dromund Kaas. Nice for solo traveller. Normally takes several days.
However, a Lord Zash has also arranged a berth for you on the Black Talon. It's an Imperial transport and is considerably faster.
However, a Darth Baras has also arranged a berth for you on the Black Talon. It's an Imperial transport and is considerably faster.
However, someone named Crysta Markon has also arranged a berth for you on the Black Talon. It's an Imperial transport and is considerably faster.
However, a berth has also been arranged for you on the Black Talon by... um, that seems to be classified. Regardless, it's an Imperial transport and is considerably faster.
Just what I wanted to hear.
No time to waste, then.
The Black Talon goes through dangerous territory, though.
Safe travels, my lord.
Safe travels, master.
Safe travels, mistress.
I'll be back. [Refuse Mission]
Of course. When you're ready.
[Start Veteran Mode]
[Start Master Mode]
[Start Story Mode]
[Not at this time]
